subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s star players Ronaldinho, Kaka and Robinho were picked yesterday for the 22-man roster for games next month in the United States. Brazil, the South American champion, will play the United States on Sept. 9 in Chicago and Mexico three days later in Foxborough, Mass.
